summary.span: 标记不再使用的程序元素。

span.span: Marks the program elements that are no longer in use.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于程序集、模块、参数和返回值之外的所有程序元素。 is applicable to all program elements except assemblies, modules, parameters, and return values. 将元素标记为过时会通知用户元素可能会在产品的未来版本中删除。Marking an element as obsolete informs users that the element may be removed in a future version of the product. 当在代码中使用属性目标时，编译器将发出赋给属性的字符串。The string assigned to the property is emitted by the compiler when the attribute target is used in code. 理想情况下，该字符串应提供某些解决方法或编程替代方法。Ideally, the string should provide some workaround or programmatic alternative. 使用 属性向编译器指示使用 特性是否应使其发出错误 ( `true`) 或) (警告 `false` 。Use the property to indicate to the compiler whether using the attribute should cause it to emit an error ( is `true`) or a warning ( is `false`). 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Windows 8.x 应用商店应用Windows 8.x Store apps 当你在 ( winmd 文件) 创建 Windows 元数据库时， 如果[Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx)只有 在源代码中存在，则将导出为属性和 windows.foundation.deprecatedattribute 属性。When you create a Windows Metadata library (.winmd file), the is exported as both the attribute and the [Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx) attribute if only the is present in source code. 转换为，如下所示 `DeprecatedAttribute` ：The is transformed to the `DeprecatedAttribute` as follows: - 如果 `message` 和 `error` 参数均存在， `message` 则将分配给 `DeprecatedAttribute` `message` 参数。If the `message` and `error` arguments are both present, `message` is assigned to the `DeprecatedAttribute` `message` argument. 将 `true` 映射到 [DeprecationType](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)的错误值，并将 `error` 值 `false` 映射到 [DeprecationType。弃用](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)。An error value of `true` maps to [DeprecationType.Remove](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx), and an `error` value of `false` maps to [DeprecationType.Deprecate](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx). - 如果在中 `message` 未提供参数，则 其默认值 `DeprecatedAttribute` 为 "已弃用 *element_name* "，其中 *element_name* 是应用该属性的目标程序元素的名称。If the `message` argument is not supplied in the , its default value in the `DeprecatedAttribute` is "*element_name* is deprecated", where *element_name* is the name of the target program element to which the attribute is applied. - 如果 `error` 中不存在参数 ，则其默认值 `DeprecatedAttribute` 为 [DeprecationType. 弃用](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)。If the `error` argument is not present in the , its default value in the `DeprecatedAttribute` is [DeprecationType.Deprecate](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx). > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议直接将 [windows.foundation.deprecatedattribute](/uwp/api/Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute) 特性应用于托管代码，因为这种导出是自动进行的。Directly applying the [Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](/uwp/api/Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute) attribute to managed code is not recommended, because this export occurs automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类，该类包含一个属性和一个用特性标记的方法 。The following example defines a class that contains a property and a method that are marked with the attribute. `OldProperty`在代码中访问属性的值会生成编译器警告，但调用方法会 `CallOldMethod` 生成编译器错误。Accessing the value of the `OldProperty` property in code generates a compiler warning, but calling the `CallOldMethod` method generates a compiler error. 该示例还显示了在您尝试编译源代码时产生的输出。The example also shows the output that results when you attempt to compile the source code. [!code-csharp[ObsoleteAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObsoleteAttribute/CS/obsoleteattributeex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObsoleteAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObsoleteAttribute/vb/obsoleteattributeex1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DiagnosticId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DiagnosticId : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当编译器报告 API 的使用情况时将使用的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID that the compiler will use when reporting a use of the API.
The unique diagnostic ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 诊断 ID 显示在警告和错误的生成输出中。The diagnostic ID is shown in build output for warnings and errors. 此属性表示可用于在需要时禁止显示警告或错误的唯一 ID。This property represents the unique ID that can be used to suppress the warnings or errors, if needed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsError As Boolean
public: property bool IsError { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示编译器是否将使用已过时的程序元素视为错误的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the compiler will treat usage of the obsolete program element as an error.

value.span: 如果将使用已过时的元素视为错误，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the obsolete element usage is considered an error; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个包含两个标记为已过时的成员的类。The following example defines a class that contains two members marked as obsolete. 第一个是名为的属性 `OldProperty` ，如果调用它，则会生成编译器警告。The first, a property named `OldProperty`, produces a compiler warning if it is called. 第二种方法是名为的方法，它会 `CallOldMethod` 生成编译器错误。The second, a method named `CallOldMethod`, produces a compiler error. 该示例使用反射来获取有关应用于 类型成员的属性的信息，并显示其 和属性的值 。The example uses reflection to get information about the attributes applied to members of the type and displays the values of their and properties. [!code-csharp[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/cs/obsoleteattribute_message.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/vb/obsoleteattribute_message.vb#1)]

The workaround text string.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个包含两个标记为已过时的成员的类。The following example defines a class that contains two members marked as obsolete. 第一个是名为的属性 `OldProperty` ，如果调用它，则会生成编译器警告。The first, a property named `OldProperty`, produces a compiler warning if it is called. 第二种方法是名为的方法，它会 `CallOldMethod` 生成编译器错误。The second, a method named `CallOldMethod`, produces a compiler error. 该示例使用反射来获取有关应用于 类型成员的属性的信息，并显示其 和属性的值 。The example uses reflection to get information about the attributes applied to members of the type and displays the values of their and properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UrlFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UrlFormat : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对应文档的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL for corresponding documentation.

summary.span: API 接受格式字符串，而不是实际的 URL，进而创建包含诊断 ID 的通用 URL。

span.span: The API accepts a format string instead of an actual URL, creating a generic URL that includes the diagnostic ID.

value.span: 表示对应文档的 URL 的格式字符串。

span.span: The format string that represents a URL to corresponding documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 示例格式字符串为 `https://contoso.com/obsoletion-warnings/{0}` 。An example format string is `https://contoso.com/obsoletion-warnings/{0}`.
